snippet: A measure that would allow small amounts has caused surprising reaction in Washington State, with former law enforcers favoring it and some who advocate medicinal usage opposing it.
abstract: Washington State measure that would allow possession of one ounce or less of marijuana has caused surprising reaction, with some former law enforcers favoring it and some who advocate medicinal usage opposing it; both sides say outcome is hard to predict.
lead_paragraph: A measure that would allow small amounts has caused surprising reaction in Washington State, with former law enforcers favoring it and some who advocate medicinal usage opposing it.

headline.seo: Vote on Legalizing Marijuana Divides Washington Groups
